verses.verse: Be not thou envious <S%H7065><s%> against evil <S%H7451><s%> men <S%H582><s%>; Neither desire to be with them <S%H183><s%>:
For their heart <S%H3820><s%> studieth <S%H1897><s%> oppression <S%H7701><s%>, And their lips <S%H8193><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> of mischief <S%H5999><s%>.
Through wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is a house <S%H1004><s%> builded <S%H1129><s%>; And by understanding <S%H8394><s%> it is established <S%H3559><s%>;
And by knowledge <S%H1847><s%> are the chambers <S%H2315><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> With all precious <S%H3368><s%> and pleasant <S%H5273><s%> riches <S%H1952><s%>.
A wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> is strong <S%H5797><s%>; Yea <S%H376><s%>, a man of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increaseth <S%H553><s%> might <S%H3581><s%>.
For by wise guidance <S%H8458><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> thy war <S%H4421><s%>; And in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counsellors <S%H3289><s%> there is safety <S%H8668><s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> is too high <S%H7311><s%> for a fool <S%H191><s%>: He openeth <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>.
He that deviseth <S%H2803><s%> to do evil <S%H7489><s%>, Men shall call <S%H7121><s%> him a mischief <S%H4209><s%> - maker <S%H1167><s%>.
The thought <S%H2154><s%> of foolishness <S%H200><s%> is sin <S%H2403><s%>; And the scoffer <S%H3887><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to men <S%H120><s%>.
If thou faint <S%H7503><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of adversity <S%H6869><s%>, Thy strength <S%H3581><s%> is small <S%H6862><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> them that are carried <S%H3947><s%> away unto death <S%H4194><s%>, And those that are ready <S%H4131><s%> to be slain <S%H4194><s%> see that thou hold back <S%H2820><s%>.

If thou sayest <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3045><s%>, we knew not this <S%H8505><s%>; Doth not he that weigheth the hearts <S%H3826><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> it <S%H5341><s%>? And he that keepeth thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, doth not he know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H7725><s%>? And shall not he render to every man <S%H120><s%> according to his work <S%H6467><s%>?

My son <S%H1121><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> thou honey <S%H1706><s%>, for it is good <S%H2896><s%>; And the droppings of the honeycomb <S%H5317><s%>, which are sweet <S%H4966><s%> to thy taste <S%H2441><s%>:

So shalt thou know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> to be unto thy soul <S%H5315><s%>; If thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> it <S%H3426><s%>, then shall there be a reward <S%H319><s%>, And thy hope <S%H8615><s%> shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
Lay not wait <S%H693><s%>, O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H5116><s%>, against the habitation of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; Destroy <S%H7703><s%> not his resting-place <S%H7258><s%>:

For a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man falleth <S%H5307><s%> seven times <S%H7651><s%>, and riseth up again <S%H6965><s%>; But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are overthrown <S%H3782><s%> by calamity <S%H7451><s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not when thine enemy <S%H341><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%>, And let not thy heart <S%H3820><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%> when he is overthrown <S%H3782><s%>;
Lest Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H7489><s%>, and it displease him <S%H7725><s%>, And he turn away his wrath from him <S%H639><s%>.
Fret <S%H2734><s%> not thyself because of evil-doers <S%H7489><s%>; Neither be thou envious <S%H7065><s%> at the wicked <S%H7563><s%>:
For there shall be no reward <S%H319><s%> to the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H5216><s%>; The lamp of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be put out <S%H1846><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> thou Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%>; And company <S%H6148><s%> not with them that are given to change <S%H8138><s%>:
For their calamity <S%H343><s%> shall rise <S%H6965><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%>; And the destruction <S%H6365><s%> from them both <S%H8147><s%>, who knoweth it <S%H3045><s%>?
These also are sayings of the wise <S%H2450><s%>. To have respect <S%H5234><s%> of persons <S%H6440><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%> is not good <S%H2896><s%>.
He that saith <S%H559><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Thou art righteous <S%H6662><s%>; Peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall curse <S%H5344><s%> him <S%H5971><s%>, nations shall abhor him <S%H2194><s%>:
But to them that rebuke <S%H3198><s%> him shall be delight <S%H5276><s%>, And a good <S%H2896><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> shall come upon them <S%H935><s%>.
He kisseth <S%H5401><s%> the lips <S%H8193><s%> Who giveth <S%H7725><s%> a right <S%H5228><s%> answer <S%H1697><s%>.

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> thy work <S%H4399><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, And make it ready <S%H6257><s%> for thee in the field <S%H7704><s%>; And afterwards <S%H310><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> thy house <S%H1004><s%>.
Be not a witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%>; And deceive <S%H6601><s%> not with thy lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> not <S%H6213><s%>, I will do so to him as he hath done <S%H6213><s%> to me <S%H7725><s%>; I will render to the man <S%H376><s%> according to his work <S%H6467><s%>.
I went <S%H5674><s%> by the field <S%H7704><s%> of the sluggard <S%H376><s%>, And by the vineyard <S%H3754><s%> of the man <S%H120><s%> void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>;

And <S%H5927><s%>, lo, it was all grown over with thorns <S%H7063><s%>, The face <S%H6440><s%> thereof was covered <S%H3680><s%> with nettles <S%H2738><s%>, And the stone <S%H68><s%> wall <S%H1444><s%> thereof was broken down <S%H2040><s%>.
Then I beheld <S%H2372><s%>, and considered well <S%H7896><s%>; I saw <S%H2372><s%>, and received <S%H3947><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>:
Yet a little <S%H4592><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>, a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber <S%H8572><s%>, A little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to sleep <S%H7901><s%>;
So shall thy poverty <S%H7389><s%> come <S%H935><s%> as a robber <S%H1980><s%>, And thy want <S%H4270><s%> as an armed <S%H4043><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.
